name: Elements
description: "Elements (ELM) is the governance currency of the Elements game project that is under development Elements (ELM) gives holders the possibility to make decisions within the elements game ecosystem At the same time you can test your skills as a player in future tournaments and collect digital pets. Within the ecosystem of elements game that is under development you will find multiple ways to interact with each other. The creation of habitats, the evolution of your pets, create new pets, test the skills of your pets. And go climbing in the ranking for being the best.
